rewrites.__comment1: Currently, the only known problamatic char is the + (2B).
rewrites.__comment2: Here, I proxy pass to the cf media server and replace the double encoded
rewrites.__comment3: character (+ -> %2B -> %252B), with the single encoded version (%252B -> %2B).
rewrites.__comment4: This means that gradle doesn't decode but not encode, and curseforge is happy with the url.
